name: Living Life... Again
description:
Life is short... So why not live it multiple times?

---A Brackeys Game Jam Submission---

play as a cute character who only has 60 seconds to live! Live how you want! You can be nice to everyone and gain a following... or you can be evil and murder everyone in sight! Your choice...

do not fear death, however! Whereas when you die. You spawn as a random NPC to change your ways of the Last life. Or do the same thing, no one stopping you!

Bugs may occur, feel free to give a detail of your issue in the comments.
